[CDF-25741] ðŸš€ Migration files v2 (#1962)

# Description

Stacked on<del> #1952 #1923 #1953, #1954, #1965</del>

**Context**: This is part of the `alpha` migration tooling in Toolkit,
for overview [see
here](https://cognitedata.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/~170890702/pages/5455773697/Migration+Tooling+in+Toolkit).
This is step 3 of that process.

This PR introduces support for file migration v2. This is built upon the
newly introduced generic migration command, which have logging, support
migrating to an arbitrary view, and an idempotent behavior.


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] Version 2 of files migration

## templates

No changes.
